hotels.name: Wyndham Garden Chinatown
hotels.description:
The newest Wyndham Garden in New York City located in Chinatown, just steps away from shopping and fine dining in Little Italy, Soho, the Lower East Side, Tribeca and Downtown Brooklyn.

This boutique-style hotel with 106 rooms, offers an intimate lobby and a superb staff that's always ready to cater to your every need.

Our property offers large flat screen TVs, complimentary WiFi, and a state of the art fitness center. We invite you to dine in our eclectic restaurant which offers breakfast, lunch and dinner.

Our Lobby Bar is also a great place to meet for cocktails and light fare.

hotels.name: Eurostars Wall Street
hotels.description:
The 4-star Hotel Eurostars Wall Street is an intimate design hotel right in downtown New York, near Wall Street and the South Street Seaport.

Its 54 bright, spacious rooms include a plasma-screen TV with satellite and international channels, a Sony Dream Machine alarm clock, Wi-Fi, coffee machine and private bathroom.

They comprise standard and executive doubles, spacious rooms sleeping up to 3 people in two queen-size beds, and extra-spacious junior suites for 2 with fully equipped kitchen, work area and living room.
Hotel Eurostars Wall Street is excellently located in Lower Manhattan, a short walk from Brooklyn Bridge, South Ferry, the Federal Reserve Bank of New York and the Broad Exchange Building.

The Statue of Liberty is easily reached via the nearby ferry terminal.
Subway: Wall Street (lines 2 and 3), 300 metres.
Bus stop (various lines): 300 metres.
Taxi rank: 10 metres.

hotels.name: Andaz Wall Street - A Hyatt Hotel
hotels.description:
Experience Lower Manhattan’s renaissance at Andaz Wall Street from Hyatt. Andaz Wall Street provides a kaleidoscope of local culture that offers you a Lower Manhattan hotel stay unlike any other.

Every detail and every moment, from cutting-edge guestrooms to authentic farm-to-table cuisine, are designed to give you a genuine and intimate New York experience.
Walk through the doors of the only hotel on Wall Street, and you’re immediately greeted by an Andaz Host.

Have a seat in the Andaz Lounge—an open, communal setting that’s equal parts living room and lobby where your Host will offer you a complimentary beverage and check you in with a handheld PC.

With no uniforms or counters, checking in is less like a procedure and more like a conversation.
The stunning guestrooms at this exclusive Downtown New York City hotel offer room to breathe with high ceilings and 345+ spacious square feet of residential-style space.

Andaz guestrooms, lounges and studios feature clean lines, ample light and innovative design in natural materials.

Veined stone, end-grain bamboo and cerused oak finish elegant rooms decorated with local artwork and offering unique features like bay window seats for reading and relaxation as well as rotating wardrobe valets with full-length mirrors to give you extra space.

A Sleep Menu and mini-bar with complimentary non-alcoholic beverages and snacks exemplify the hospitality that makes a stay at Andaz unique.

hotels.name: Hampton Inn Seaport Financial District
hotels.description:
A classic Downtown Manhattan hotel, the Hampton Manhattan Seaport Financial District is well placed for visiting many of New York’s top sights and attractions.

Be certain to take the short walk over the stunning Brooklyn Bridge and enjoy fabulous views of the Manhattan skyline from Brooklyn Heights.

In Downtown Manhattan, you’ll be within easy reach of pretty City Hall, the World Trade Centre memorial and the Statue of Liberty cruises at Battery Park.
Clean, comfy and inviting, retreat to the comfort of one of the Hampton Manhattan Seaport Financial District hotel’s 65 guestrooms.

Each room comes equipped with home comforts including HDTV, roomy private bathroom, work space and coffeemaker for your convenience.

Complimentary Wi-Fi access is also available throughout.
Guests at the Hampton Manhattan Seaport Financial District can start their day in New York right with the hotel’s superb hot breakfast buffet.

When evening rolls around, friendly staff are on hand to direct you to the best local restaurants. At the end of a long day, you can also relax and blow off some steam with a visit to the hotel’s well-equipped fitness room.

hotels.name: Duane Street Hotel Tribeca
hotels.description:
The Duane Street Hotel is a stylish boutique hotel at the corner of Duane and Church Street, one of Tribeca's main thoroughfares.

The surrounding neighborhood is best known for the Tribeca Film Festival. If you're not visiting during the festival (usually held around the end of April), catch an independent film at the Tribeca Cinema, a 10-minute walk.

From the Chambers Street subway station, just 2 blocks away, trains connect directly to popular destinations like Greenwich Village, Times Square, and the Theater District, and to outlying points like Brooklyn's hip Park Slope neighborhood.

Wherever you wander, be sure to come back to the Duane Street Hotel's Mehtaphor Restaurant for dinner.

This brainchild of acclaimed chef Jehangir Mehta serves world cuisine with diverse influences such as Asian fare, American pastries, and tapas-style dining.

Mehtaphor also offers breakfast daily, and room service during limited hours. The concierge can of course point you to more can't-miss dining spots.

Or you can do your own research on one of the hotel's iPads; iPad use and wireless Internet access are both complimentary during your stay.

Another great free perk: access to Tribeca Health & Fitness, a sizable fitness facility just 2 blocks from the hotel.

After a workout, relax with an in-room massage treatment (surcharge) from nearby Euphoria Spa. Returning to your guestroom feels like retiring to one of Tribeca's stylish loft apartments.

Hardwood floors, oversized windows, and custom furniture give rooms a homey feel, while bright splashes of color and simple design elements keep things edgy and modern.

Watch your favorite show on plasma HDTV with premium cable channels. In addition to Wi-Fi, rooms are equipped with complimentary wired high-speed Internet access and 17-inch safes that accommodate laptops.

Clock radios have MP3 connections, so you can play your own music. Slate-and-marble bathrooms offer multiple comforts: Enjoy a bath or a rainfall shower, before wrapping up in a plush robe and slippers.

Traveling with kids? They can pick the night's reading from the Scholastic Bedtime Library, available at the front desk.

All guestrooms are non-smoking.

hotels.name: Millenium Hilton
hotels.description:
A stunning four star hotel, the Hilton Millenium is an impressive place to stay on your New York City break.

Located right opposite the World Trade Centre – including its must-see memorial – you’ll also be well placed for visiting a number of New York’s top attractions.

Whilst staying at the hotel be sure to take the short walk to the Brooklyn Bridge, see the financial district with a stroll down Wall Street, and board a Statue of Liberty cruise from Battery Park.
One of the largest hotels in Lower Manhattan, the Hilton Millenium has 471 guestrooms, each offering a welcome retreat from the busy city streets.

Sleekly furnished, each room has an easy elegance and comes equipped with plasma TV, radio, telephone and a coffeemaker to make you feel right at home.

Wi-Fi access is also available throughout the hotel.
When evening rolls around at the Hilton Millenium, be sure to find yourself at the divine 3rd Floor Church & Dey Restaurant; serving up classic American cuisine throughout the day, it’s also a great place to enjoy a cocktail or two.

The ultra-chic lobby lounge Liquid Assets is the must-visit venue for a nightcap however. To properly relax and unwind, don’t miss the hotel’s terrific onsite pool and fitness centre.

hotels.name: Comfort Inn Manhattan Bridge
hotels.description:
This 2008 newly constructed high rise hotel with views of the East River is a 100 percent smoke free Comfort Inn and located within walkiing distance of the sights, sounds and tastes of Chinatown and Little Italy.

Property is a short subway ride from downtown Manhattan, Wall Street, Battery Park, South Street Seaport, Chelsea and the West Village.

You can admire the art galleries, small parks and galleries in this neighborhood. Free deluxe continental breakfast served daily.

Pay parking garage one block away. There is a 150.00 charge if anyone is caught smoking. Valid ID is required upon check in.

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Wall Street
hotels.description:
Based next to the city’s main subway lines, the Holiday Inn – New York City – Wall Street hotel is an excellent choice of accommodation for those who want to navigate their way around New York with ease.

Hop on a ferry and see the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island, marvel at the Brooklyn Bridge, or enjoy a shopping trip along the renowned 5th Avenue.

Alternatively, stroll through the stunning Central Park at your leisure.
All of the guest rooms at the Holiday Inn – New York City – Wall Street hotel are excellently designed and offer a range of additional amenities to make you feel at home.

All rooms include a flat screen TV, wireless internet access, a private bathroom with hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and individually controlled air-conditioning.
Dine at the modern BullPen Bar & Grill restaurant and try a sumptuous selection of Italian-American specialities.

The hotel also offers an on-site health and fitness centre, a dedicated lounge area and the Federal Café serving a delicious range of drinks throughout the day.

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Express New York City-Wall Street
hotels.description:
Brand new in 2009, the Holiday Inn Express Downtown Manhattan is conveniently located on Water Street close to Wall Street.

We are just a short distance from NY Stock Exchange, City Hall, Federal Reserve Bank, and World Trade Center.

Lower Manhattan will keep you fully entertained by offering a variety of attractions including South Street Seaport, Battery Park, Little Italy, Chinatown, and walking distance from the South Ferry which connects to the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island.

We offer 112 luxuriously appointed guest rooms equipped with deluxe new bedding, Smart Bath Collection amenities, wired/wireless high-speed Internet access.

This newly constructed hotel also features an exercise room, business center, and hot breakfast bar. We are confident that your stay with us will be a pleasant experience, so Stay Smart!, The Holiday Inn Express New York City - Wall Street is now accepting reservations for arrivals after July 25, 2010.

hotels.name: World Hotel
hotels.description:
With free Wi-Fi and a/c, this hotel offers basic, no-frills accommodation at bargain rates in New York's Chinatown, just a short walk from the fashionable SoHo and NoLIta neighbourhoods.
The 70 rooms at the New World Hotel are compact and simply furnished, and come with a choice of shared and private bathrooms.

Rooms for between 1 and 4 guests are available, and all of them are equipped with Wi-Fi and air conditioning.

The hotel has a 24-hour reception service and a left-luggage office.
The hotel is fantastically situated in the heart of downtown New York, with all the sights and sounds of Chinatown on the doorstep.

Head over to the Lower East Side to take in the nightlife, visit Little Italy, or jump on the subway to reach Central Park, Broadway and other major sights in just a few minutes.
Metro: Grand St (lines B, D), 150 metres; Bowery (J, M, Z), 300 metres.
